metadata.description: Inventory - REQUIRED. Environment, including geographic location, for Power Automate - Ex for commercial: https://flow.microsoft.com/manage/environments/

Inventory - If true, (the default) the CoE inventory tracks all environments. New environments added to the inventory will have their Excuse from Inventory to false. You can opt out individual environments.  If false, the CoE inventory tracks a subset of environments. New environments added to the inventory will have their Excuse from Inventory to true. You can opt in individual environments.

parameters.$filter: _admin_pvacomponent_value eq null or _admin_flow_value eq null or _admin_pvacomponentenvt_value eq null
admin_solutiondeleted ne true and admin_SolutionEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_businessprocessflowdeleted ne true and admin_BusinessProcessFlowEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_rpadeleted ne true and admin_DesktopflowEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_connectordeleted ne true and admin_EnvironmentCustomConnector/admin_environmentdeleted eq true and admin_iscustomapi eq true
admin_pvadeleted ne true and admin_PVAEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_aideleted ne true and admin_AiEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_flowdeleted ne true and admin_FlowEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_appdeleted ne true and admin_AppEnvironment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true
admin_connectormodified eq null and admin_iscustomapi eq true
admin_EnvironmentCustomConnector/admin_excusefrominventory eq true and admin_iscustomapi eq true
_admin_environmentcustomconnector_value eq null and admin_iscustomapi eq true
_admin_environment_value eq null or admin_environmentsecurityrolepermissionid eq null or admin_Environment/admin_environmentdeleted eq true

parameters.item/admin_excusefrominventory: @if(equals(parameters('is All Environments Inventory (admin_isFullTenantInventory)'), true), false, true)

parameters.$filter: admin_name eq 'admin_http' or admin_name eq 'admin_httpwebhook' or admin_name eq 'shared_microsoftspatialservices'
admin_hasimplicitconnections eq null and admin_powerappstype ne 597910001 and admin_appdeleted ne true and admin_appconnections ne null
admin_businessprocessflowstatecode eq null or admin_businessprocessflowstatuscode eq null
admin_aistatecode eq null or admin_aistatuscode eq null
admin_powerappstype eq 597910001 and admin_applogicalname eq null and admin_inventoryme ne true and admin_appdeleted ne true

Delete_Bad_Data.description: We will build to this clean up over time. For now just a few to get it started

Initialize_variable_flowEnvironment.description: Environment location specific Flow URL - remember / at the end

parameters.item/admin_flowinstanceurl: @concat(parameters('Power Automate Environment Variable (admin_PowerAutomateEnvironmentVariable)'), workflow()?['tags']['environmentName'], '/flows/', workflow()?['name'], '/runs/', workflow()?['run']['name'])

Catch_-_not_ready_to_take_last_run_date.inputs: Catch - not ready to take last run date
